name: Daisy Brindle
title: Daisy Brindle
blog_text:
Guess What???  My awesome Foster Family decided to adopt me and I’m over the moon!  My new Dad works from home and I will get to be his coworker.  That means lots of love and walks and love and snuggles and love and…
Thank you Foster Family for falling in love with me and giving me a furever home!

name: Gabby
title: Gabby
blog_text: Gabby has a home with her wonderful foster mom!  Gabby is such a beautiful and wonderful Dane, and Amber wants to make sure she has a forever home for whatever time she has left.   Amber has been at her side through all her ups and downs and Gabby has been a gift to all that have met her.  Truly, a match that was meant to be.

name: Poppy
title: Poppy
blog_text: WOWSA!  A wonderful retired lady has asked me to come and live with her!  I get to wake up in her bed, hang on the couch for Snuggle TV, putter in the garden and yard, more Snuggle TV before bed and then bed with her.  What could be better for two retired ladies???

name: Duke
title: Duke
blog_text: Giddy Up – I’m staying home!   To all of you who have asked about me, my Foster Family fell in love with me and I get to stay with them FUREVER in Colorado.  They have lots of Great Dane Experience, and they have adopted from our Rescue in the past.  I have already inspected and approved the home, so I’m sticking with them!

name: Max
title: Max
blog_text:
Oh Yes I DO!   I wiggled my little way into the hearts of my Foster Family and they want to keep me!  Yippee, I have a little hooman girl to play with and some cats – and we are the same size. For now, tee hee.
I get to go for walks and doggie day care and all sorts of new things as I grow up with my furever family.  My family has renamed me Pickles!
FacebookXShare

name: Tigs
title: Tigs
blog_text: Hey, Y’all – I got a new home!!!  And get this – I will have 3 dogs, 3 cats and 3 human siblings to play with.  ALL THE TIME!  I can’t wait to meet them all and get settled in with this very active, very loving, Animal’N’Kid Crazy Home!

name: Nike
title: Nike
blog_text: Hi Everyone – a beautiful family has invited me to spend my retirement years with them! I am looking forward to lots of time on their big couch for movie nights, lots of cuddles and almost always someone will be at home with me. Oh my lucky stars! They have decide to call me Nonna and I love it!

name: Athena
title: Athena
blog_text: Can you believe it? I had an amazing Foster Mom and she took great care of me while my new Forever Mom was looking for me! Forever Mom and her Folks are RMGDRI alum and I can’t wait to meet my new playmates, a Malamute, a Dane and a German Shepherd.

name: Luna
title: Luna
blog_text: I’m living a charmed life.  I came to RMGDRI as a Foster and in the first week my new family decided to adopt me, Luna!   I didn’t know Great Dane Life was this good.  I get to live with another dog and a wonderful new human sister!

name: Rocky
title: Rocky
blog_text: I feel in love with my Foster the first time I met him and we have been fast buddies ever since.  I am staying with him forever so I can lay at his feet or on his knee while he plays guitar songs for me!

name: Antero
title: Antero
blog_text: Just look at meeee – my new name is Dobby!  My Fosters knew immediately I was the right kid to go with their kids and we all decided to keep me! Antero was named after Dobby, the House Elf in Harry Potter, so he is now Dobby the House Horse.

name: Dakota
title: Dakota
blog_text: BREAKING NEWS:  Dakota Is Headed To His New Home – that is my headline!  I met this really nice lady who decided I am just what she needs in her life.  I get to live with her and her adult son, and you better believe there is going to be tons and tons of love going around – especially as I start to grow, tee hee.

name: Manitou
title: Manitou
blog_text: Oh, Wowser, I’m sure gonna miss my Foster home and my sister, but I’m going to an amazing family who fell in love with me when they met me.  I am going to rock the center of their world!

name: Orvis
title: Orvis
blog_text: You should just check out my pics on Facebook - you can see me learning to play tug of war with my big sister, Hazel.  I'm learning so fast, Hazel decided to adopt me!  Woo Hoo - what a great place to land for a young fella like me.  Hazel decided to name me Bob.

name: Journey
title: Journey
blog_text:
I’ve come a long way, Baby!  I came into the Rescue 2 years ago with my brothers and sisters – we were The Springs Litter (I’m named after Journey Springs in the San Luis Valley).  I’ve been on medical hold all this time while my Foster Mom worked hard with the vet to get me healthy, and we are inseparable.
Thank you, Amber, for fostering me.  And a Very Big Thank You to those who contributed to my medical care – we couldn’t have done it without you.

name: Salida
title: Salida
blog_text: Oh, just look at Little Cute Me!  I found a home with a Mastiff and a Kelpie I can play with.  I know they will teach me good manners and it is already fun living with them.  The dogs, Max and Lili Grace, decided to rename me “Pepper”.

name: Waunita
title: Waunita
blog_text: Oh, Happy Day!  I’m moving in with an amazing family that adopted from RMGDRI before – and one of my new mom’s is a vet, so I will all the best and personalized care possible.  I have a sweet Dane sister and a kitty to cuddle with too.  They call me Kaia now, Life is Good!

name: Zeva
title: Zeva
blog_text: Let me Weave-A tail of success for Zeva.  I found my forever home with my Foster Family and now that I’ve successfully met all of my adoption requirements, I am theirs forever!  I live with two cats and my Family stays at home with me lots and we are all one big Happy!

name: Charlee
title: Charlee
blog_text: WOWEEE – IT’S CHARLEE and I have a forever home with a family that has been looking high and low for me. I will get to live with another 1 year Dane who I can’t wait to meet and get started immediately on our play routine! Thank you Angela Dunn and family for Fostering me!

name: Sam
title: Sam
blog_text: Sam and Smudge.  Smudge says its Smudge and Sam.  Because Smudge the Cat is the Boss and I’m totally cool with that.   I get to stay forever with my new buddy and my Foster family.  Life is Good!!!

name: Lu
title: Lu
blog_text: Oh, the stories we could tell!  You see, my new Forever Dad and me have a few years between us.  We knew immediately we had a bond and we enjoy getting to know each other and figuring out who has the better stories.  I’m sure leading the charmed life now!!!

name: Asher
title: Asher
blog_text: I did it!  I found my wonderful forever family and I adopted them!  I have a big brother Dane named Andy and we are quite the pair.  I have two human brothers too – so I am quite the Queen of the house!

name: Zeus
title: Zeus
blog_text: Just look at me now!   I bet you can tell which is me and which is my new Forever Brother, Lurch!   I found this amazing family who look after me for the rest of my life and give me all the love and comforts that I missed out on earlier.  They have renamed me Winston, because I remind them of a broad-shouldered little guy looking worried about the world – so yes, that is me with the serious face.

name: Claire
title: Claire
blog_text: The Escape Artist is in the house – for good!  I used to open doors and gates and run away, and my wonderful Foster turned Adoptive Family worked hard with me to teach me that Home is where the Heart is.  I love my new family – kids, dogs and cat, and especially my new Dad!!!

name: Romeo
title: Romeo
blog_text: For never was there a story of more woe than this of Juliet and her Romeo.  WAIT.  We changed the ending! This Romeo has found his Happy Place where I am the only star in the play and I live happily ever after with my forever family.

name: Big Mac
title: Big Mac
blog_text: I am forever grateful my amazing Foster Family decided to Adopt me!  I love my human kids and my big sister Dane and bit sister Lab-mix who are teaching me to be a great puppy.  Lucky meeeee!

name: Moose
title: Moose
blog_text: The Moose is in the Hoose to stay!  I have these wonderful Fosters who have helped me gain some weight and learn to live my best life and I decided I would Adopt them and keep them forever.

name: Loki
title: Loki
blog_text:
I did it!  I wrapped my Foster Family around my little paw and they decided to keep me forever.  Shhh – don’t tell them that was my plan all along.
Thank you, Winna and Family for Fostering me, and thank you Heather and Family for Fostering and then adopting me.

name: Ivy
title: Ivy
blog_text: It was love at first sight!  The Rescue showed me a picture of my Fosters and let me read all about them and I chose them as my forever home right away!  The family even comes with a cat and a dog for me to pal around with.  Ahhh, this is the life I deserve.

name: Kai
title: Kai
blog_text: Did I win the jackpot or what?  I was not getting along with the dogs I was living with – when the older one died I thought I was next in line for the Alpha title.  So this wonderful Foster family with no other pets invited me over and we became the bestest friends and the bestest family right away and Kai is here to stay!

name: Kira
title: Kira
blog_text: You will never believe my story.  I’m a Deaf Dane and I was taken to a shelter.  This amazing family came to get me as soon as they found out about me.  They took me home and learned how to take care of a special needs girl and said I could stay with them forever.  This Rescue has the best families anywhere!

name: Bentley
title: Bentley
blog_text: Bentley here with another Foster Win!!!  My Foster parents fell in love with me the minute we met and I knew I would have the best life if I adopted them, so here we are!

name: Oliver
title: Oliver
blog_text: I told my Foster Family I would not let them up until they adopted me.  But Dad played hard to get because I think he likes the snuggles.  I’ve come a long way on my journey and am so thankful they have worked tirelessly with me.  Happy Dance for Me!

name: Toby
title: Toby
blog_text: Toby has a home!  From Mom’s mouth to your ears!  Toby is doing amazing we love him so much. He was a perfect fit into our home. He is a loving and sweet boy who is thriving. Loves zooming in the back yard and fills his days with pets and toys.

name: Butter
title: Butter
blog_text: Sad stories can have happy endings, too!  My Mom sadly passed away and a RMGDI volunteer scooped me up and said she had never seen my new brother, Koa, bond with anyone so quickly.  I am forever in my new family – err, excuse me, gotta go play!

name: Kara
title: Kara
blog_text: I lost my Dad recently and this wonderful family took me in and showed me all the love I was missing from him.  We decided I should stay with them forever and I am so happy and content.

name: Milan
title: Milan
blog_text: So I was at the dog park and met a dog and his family and they invited me to their Forever home and just look at me now!

name: Dane
title: Dane
blog_text: My Foster-now-Forever Parents brought me home and I snuggled right in – literally. We go on lots of walks together and sometimes they have to wake me up from a nap to go walk. And then we snuggle some more.

name: Athena
title: Athena
blog_text:
Athena from Mimi’s litter has a home!

Yay, Me!!!  I’m going home with my new Mom in Missouri!  She is very active and will take me for lots of walks and just everywhere she goes – even traveling.  I am so happy I will be living with my new Mom who has lots of Dane experience and she will help me grow up to be a wonderful companion to her and a great friend to all the new people and dogs I will get to meet.

Thank you Foster Family for taking care of me and my brothers and sisters while the Rescue found my new Mom!!

name: Iris (now Sammy)
title: Iris (now Sammy)
blog_text:
Iris, now Sammy, from Mimi’s litter has a home!

Yessss!    I’m going home with my new Dad in Colorado and can’t wait to spend all my time with him.  He is semi-retired and will take me lots of places and on long walks every day.  His daughter has a Great Dane, too.  Does that make me an Aunt already?  I will get to stay with them on the rare occasion I can’t go with Dad on his travels.    Wow, already my new family just got bigger!

Thank you Foster Family for taking care of me and my brothers and sisters while Dad was looking for me through the Rescue!

name: Charlie
title: Charlie
blog_text: Oh, Yeah! I did it! I snuggled and charmed and amused my way into my Foster Family’s heart and I’m sticking with them! Foster Dad works from home and he also is one of the Rescue Volunteers, so I have been able to listen in on his phone calls and video chats while he helps other dogs find homes. I am super excited to be right where I am!

name: Penelope
title: Penelope
blog_text:
Penelope (now Frankie) from Mimi’s litter has a home!

Well, won’t you just look at me!  I’m going home with my new family in Utah!   I am so happy I will be with them and they will take me on walks and I get to meet new dogs and people, yippee!!!  My new family has fostered for, and adopted from RMGDRI before, and they have lots of Dane experience.  And I hear they have a super awesome pet sitter for when I can’t go with them! They have named me Frankie too!

name: Juniper
title: Juniper
blog_text:
Guess who gets to stay forever with her Foster Family?  Me, Me, Juniper!   I am so happy Foster Mom fell in love with me and I get to stay with my Great Dane used-to-be-foster-now-my forever brother!  And he was adopted from RMGDRI two years ago.  And a cat too – who could be so lucky!

I get to take multiple walks each day with Mom and Brother and I get to ride in the backseat with him too.  Thank you for Fostering me, Mom!

name: Phoebe
title: Phoebe
blog_text:
Well, just look at Me – Phoebe from Mimi’s litter!  I’m going home with my new Dad and Mom in Colorado!   They have lots of Dane experience and will be just the right people to help me become the beautiful lady I am destined to be.  Dad is a long time volunteer for the Rescue and they have adopted from RMGDRI before.
I am looking forward to my long walks and hikes every day – and meeting my new big sisters – a Great Dane and a Cat.
FacebookXShare

name: Mera
title: Mera
blog_text: Yay, Mera!  I did it – I wormed my cute little self into Foster Mom’s heart and I get to stay just where I am!  I already know Mom’s two older dogs and am sure happy to be able to stay with them.  Mom is home all the time with us, and we are already a happly little family.

name: Duke
title: Duke
blog_text: Ok, so get this: I was being fostered on a place that rescues horses and that has lots of land and room to run.  And I have a new home on a place that… wait for it….yep, that has lots of land and room to run and also rescues  horses.  What an easy transition for me!  My new family has lots of experience with giving meds and treatments so I will be in great hands with my medical needs.  I already got to meet them and am super excited to go home with them forever!!!

name: Gypsy Rose
title: Gypsy Rose
blog_text: Hooray!  I get to stay with the best Fosters ever!  They are adopting me and loving on me and continuing to work with me.  I am so relieved I get to stay with them forever!

name: Lucy
title: Lucy
blog_text: I LOVE LUCY!  That’s what Foster Mom said so I’m staying right here with her and our cat.  I get to go on walks and have doggie friends over and snuggle with my new Mom!  And if I misbehave, the cat has some ‘splainin’ to do, hee hee.

name: Mimi
title: Mimi
blog_text: Hi Everyone – Someone fell in love with me and is taking me home!  I get to live with a great couple who are former RMGDRI Foster / Adopters, so I will be living with another RMGDRI alum and a Border Collie/Great Pyr mix.  Yippee!  I can’t wait to meet my new family and get all settled in and play with my new brothers and parents!

name: Apollo
title: Apollo
blog_text: Apollo has landed. Oh yes, I have, in my furever home with my Foster Dad! He is retired and has lots of toys for me and we go on walks and I get to spend all of my time with him. Better than going to the moon.

name: Brandi
title: Brandi
blog_text:
This Ol’ Gal found a great home in Oklahoma!  My new mom has fostered and adopted many dogs through the years, many of them in their Golden Years, so she knows just how to care for me.  I will have a Foster Brother and two Foster Sisters and I will get to go on walks with them through the neighborhood!  I just love this Rescue!

FacebookXShare

name: Max
title: Max
blog_text: This is a picture of me with my human dad and doggy bro and sis!! (I’m the good looking one in the middle) I came here as a foster right around my human mum’s birthday. I think that had something to do with this being my forever home now. Yippee!

name: Duncan
title: Duncan
blog_text: Yahoo! I get to stay with my Foster Dad and we are both committing to lots of walks and exercise together. He has been working with me on becoming the Greatest Dane I can be and we are getting along just swell

name: Kingsley
title: Kingsley
blog_text: Yep. Yep. Yep.  I have a new home and I am so excited I will have two girl sisters to love on me and two Goldendoodles to romp around with!  I can’t wait to meet my new family and give them all the love I’ve been storing up for them.  Oh, and get this – I am getting a camper in the deal so I can go with my new family everywhere, woo hoo!

name: Dozer
title: Dozer
blog_text: I’m a doozy of a Dozer! I’m 8 years old, but run around my new Dad’s property like I was a puppy! I share my home with 3 other Great Danes; Sully & Molly who also were adopted from RMGDRI, and Chayse, who is not an alumni, but a really cool pup too. I like to snuggle with my Dad, and make a puppy pile with my brothers and sister when we are not running and playing. I am living the good life, and am so happy my Dad and I found each other!

name: Jack
title: Jack
blog_text: Jack is in the House!  Yessss, I get to stay with my Family FUREVER!!!   They are previous Dane owners and I will be their only dog.  I will have some older human siblings to hang with and a great big back yard to explore.

name: Bella
title: Bella
blog_text: Oh Happy Day!  Foster Mom decided to adopt me and change my name to Ella Mae. I have settled right into myself-appointed duty of reigning over the backyard and I adore my big brother, Thor (RMGDRI alum). He is my favorite pillow, chew toy, and playmate. Every day, I get him to play with me more and more. Mom says “we are loving the life and energy Ella brings to the family. We are excited for hikes and lake time this summer, and showing Ella how rad life can be!”  What could be better???

name: Penelope
title: Penelope
blog_text: I have found my forever family with Dasha & Jon! I really enjoy being the only dog and getting all the attention a senior gal should get! Dasha works from home so I’ll have company all day long, and will probably go for some morning walks to stretch my legs. They call me Penny, which I love, and I get to call them Mom and Dad!

name: Khan
title: Khan
blog_text: Whooo hoo!  Yippee!!  I have a new family with not one, but two boys to play with.  What could be better??  They will take me on the looooong walks I love and we will learn all sorts of new things together.  My new brothers lived with a Dane before and so I’m looking forward to learning from them how to be a Great Dane. Khan has been renamed Sonic.

name: Bruce
title: Bruce
blog_text: So, The Boss said, “Old is good if you’re gathering in life.”  And that’s just what I’m doing.  I will be spending my nights in a king sized bed with my new Mom as we gather in our dreams together.  I cannot wait to meet her and the rest of the family!  And I get a new Corgi brother too.  Life is truly good as I gather it in.

name: Siren
title: Siren
blog_text: Well, how about that!  The 3 dogs and 3 cats in Foster Mom’s home got together and asked her to adopt me and she said yes!  So I get to stay right where I am and sleep in one big fur pile with all my new besties.  I can’t thank them enough for going to bat for the Boomer.

name: George
title: George
blog_text: By George, I’ve done it!  I’ve gone and gotten a new home.  I can’t wait to meet my new family – I will have a cat to boss me and a St. Bernard and Great Pyrenees to pal around with, and new people to love all over me all of the time.  What could be better?

name: Snoop
title: Snoop
blog_text: Snoop Dog is going home!  You betcha – I have a wonderful new home with two Dane lovers and get this:  I get to live with a 12 year old big sister Dane – I can’t wait to meet her so she can teach me all sorts of great things about my new home!

name: Lilo
title: Lilo
blog_text: Princess Lilo has found her Castle!  I get to stay with the King and Queen who Fostered me!   Sooo happy, I get to keep going on walks and car rides with them and lots of snuggle time – and I get to keep trying to get all those statues to play with me.  Life is GREAT!

name: Holly
title: Holly
blog_text: Good Golly, Miss Holly has found a home!!!  I am going to live with another RMGDRI alum adopted earlier this year, and an itty bitty Chihuahua.  This should be great fun.  My new Mom has a big soft spot for us older girls, so I am just thrilled to meet my new family.

name: Stitch
title: Stitch
blog_text:
Awwwww, Snap!  I have a new home to go to!  I get to live with another Dane and get lots of walks and pets and love!
I sure will miss my Foster Parents and Big Foster Brother, I want to say thank you to them for taking such good care of me while my Forever Mom was looking for me.

name: Atlas
title: Atlas
blog_text: You know what an atlas is, right?  A collection of charts and maps that opens up the whole world to you.  Well that just happened to me.  My whole world just opened up because a family with 30 years of Great Dane experience is adopting me, Atlas!!!  Woo hoo!  I get to live with some pugs and a cat and I can’t wait to meet and love all over every one of them.

name: Ocean
title: Ocean
blog_text: Ocean has swept right into the hearts of her foster family, and has found her forever home! A famous man once said, ” The ocean, once it casts its spell, holds one in its net of wonder forever”. This couldn’t be more true! Ocean is full of mystery and wonderment, and her family ls definitely under her spell. Ocean will live with Gary, an RMGDRI alum, and Irma- her Doberman sister, and will be a treasured member of her family for all of her days. We are so happy for Ocean and her family! Congrats to you!

name: Dixie
title: Dixie
blog_text: I’m so excited guys! My foster family fell for my charms and has decided to make me an official member of their family! Yay!! They are getting good at this too, because I am the second foster they have decided to adopt! They call it “Foster Failure”, and I’m happy they decided to foster fail me!  Oh, by the way, my foster family has given me a new name, and I love it ZOE much!

name: Fats
title: Fats
blog_text: Hooray for Fats!  I charmed and snuggled my way into the hearts of my Foster Family and they want to keep me forever!  I get to keep playing with their other dogs and living a great life.

name: Ella
title: Ella
blog_text: Another Successful Foster Failure!   Yes, that’s right, 10 year old Me gets to live out my years with a 10 month old Dane Puppy – I will be teaching her a thing or two.  I was fostered with her and we are already Besties and I am so happy I get to stay with her and my Foster Family.  Yay, Ella!!!

name: Diesel fawn
title: Diesel fawn
blog_text: If you could only see me now!  My Foster Family decided pretty quickly that I was the right dog to fit into their pack.  I’m going to stay with them forever, I’ve decided.  I get to live with two other dogs, a cat, some horses, and some wonderful humans I already love.

name: Brooke
title: Brooke
blog_text: Brooke has a home!  I am so happy to report I am a victim of Foster Failure.  That’s right!!!  My Foster Parents have invited me to live with them forever and I could not be happier!  I get to hang with my new brother Dane and he decided he would be happy to share family cuddles and love with me.  Can a girl get any luckier than this???

name: Athena
title: Athena
blog_text: It’s permanent!  My foster family has worked hard to help me get over my fearfulness.  They understand all my quirks and are going to be here to cuddle with me when I get scared at the wind and storms and to laugh and cheer me on when I get zoomies. AND I have a bunch of toys to run around with when I get the urge.

name: Olive
title: Olive
blog_text: Yayyy!  My Foster Mom from the start promised to keep me and now we are making it official.  I get to stay with her forever and keep building the amazing bond we have made.  And she calls me Lilith now.

name: Lucy
title: Lucy
blog_text: Wheeee!  Here I go to my new Forever Mom!  I can’t wait to love on her and follow her around and grow up with her teaching me all the things I need to know to be an awesome Lady Lucy Dane!

name: Duke
title: Duke
blog_text: Ah, yes, the life of a Duke!  My forever family found me and I’m going home with them today!  I will get to live with a really big Golden Doodle (bet I’m bigger!) and learn lots and lots from my new friend

name: Bently
title: Bently
blog_text: taking me to a gazillion vet appointments, but I’ve finally slid into home base!  I decided early on I was going to stay with this family forever, so I’ve snuggled my way into their hearts and it’s a Foster WIN all around.

name: Toni
title: Toni
blog_text: Check this out – me and my new family!  I’ve been living with them for a bit while I got spayed, and now I’m living with them forever!!!  I have some human brothers and sisters and a Dane brother and a hedgehog – we are all quite the family.

name: Babe
title: Babe
blog_text: I am so happy my Foster Dad decided to adopt little cute me!  I have been living with the coolest Foster Brother who is deaf and vision impaired and I’ve already learned so much from him – and I just love hanging with him and the rest of the Family.

name: Willie
title: Willie
blog_text: Oh, Hey.  I’m tryin to be all laid back and all when I tell you I’m going to live with a really laid back 3 yoa female dog who can teach me a thing or two as I grow up!  And I will get a human brother and sister in the deal, and some parents with Great Dane Experience.  Hooray!!!  I mean, cool.

name: Buck
title: Buck
blog_text: Can you believe it?  I have a forever home with my new Dane brother, Moguls, and my new family named me Slopes!  I get to live on a huge property with them and we go for hikes, snowshoeing, Nordic skiing and all sorts of other fun things.  And then I get naps.   Heaven on earth!

name: Kane
title: Kane
blog_text: Hey!  Kane here.  I found an amazing family I’ve been living with as a Foster and I decided to keep them.  I am considered a Foster Winner.  I’m the only fur kid in the house and I have two teenagers to play with.  Success!!!

name: Cambria
title: Cambria
blog_text: Would you like to know a little secret?  I just went home with a really nice lady who appreciates and understands my age – we have already become bff’s!  I will be living with her and her husband and pretty soon, he will be bringing home a Dane brother for me!

name: Willow
title: Willow
blog_text: I am so very excited I have found my forever family!  My new mom grew up with Danes and has been looking for me to be her next special someone.  I will get to live with a Golden Retriever Service Dog – I bet he will teach me a lot.

name: Romeo
title: Romeo
blog_text: Wherefore art thou, Romeo?  Here!  I’m headed to my new home in Nebraska where I get to live with this cool family with 3 other dogs.  Their dogs are in learning mode, too, so I will fit right in and learn how to be the best dog ever with them!

name: Bohdi
title: Bohdi
blog_text: Well what about that!  I was described as the Perfect Foster Dog and now I am going to a Perfect Forever Home.  I am so excited, I can’t wait to meet my new family.  I will get to live with two other dogs, a cat, and two wonderful kiddos!  This is gonna be good, I just know it.

name: Drago
title: Drago
blog_text: You will never believe this – my Foster Mom picked me up from Boarding and fell right in love with me.  I’ve been on my best behavior, as far as I know, so I can stay with her forever!  I am enjoying my training and learning to fit right in.

name: Lucy
title: Lucy
blog_text:
I’m Lucy, I’m Home!  I am so very honored to get to stay with my Foster family – it was love at first sight for all of us.  I am living with two cats and a
bearded dragon, but none of them are leash trained, so it will just be me and my new parents on daily walks and weekend hikes – yippee, time with them all to myself.

name: Bruno
title: Bruno
blog_text: She’s a Keeper – My Foster Mom, that is, and I just Love Her.  We have developed such a strong bond that we just want to stay together.

name: Luna
title: Luna
blog_text: This family that was Fostering me was sure they were just going to help me out until I found my forever home, ha ha.  I wiggled my way into everyone’s heart the same way I wiggle my way on to the couch – front legs first, forgetting how my back legs work.  Their oldest’s Dane has never been accepting or close with any dog, but I cracked her shell and now I love her and protect her like she has always been my big sister.   It’s like my Foster / Forever Mom just said she could see it in my face when I arrived:  I know you’ve been waiting for me and guess what…I’M HERE!  Let’s get this party started.

name: Fiona
title: Fiona
blog_text: So, there was the family with another female Dane that decided I needed to be part of their pack.  I snuggled my way into their hearts PDQ and we have been getting along famously while they were fostering me.  And today, they adopted cute little me!  I’m so happy to be staying with them forever!

name: Casper
title: Casper
blog_text: I have some very exciting news.  My Foster Family decided to adopt me and help me grow into the most amazing Dane I can be!  And sometimes I will get play dates with my sister Dane.  I’m giving them extra special snuggles tonight!

name: Titan
title: Titan
blog_text: Sometimes, Life goes at a pretty fast pace.  I came into the Rescue and went to a Foster home, and within 25 days, I was adopted by my Fosters.   They pretty much told me this was a permanent situation on Day 1 and so I put on my best behavior so they would not change their minds!  I learned to get along with their cat – check him out in my pic!

name: Bruno Harl
title: Bruno Harl
blog_text: SCORE!  This amazing family took me in as a Foster and within days, I knew I was keeping them forever.  I poured on the charm and affection and good behavior and they fell for it.  I have a wonderful new sister to play with. She even has spots like me. Life is Great!

name: Pharaoh
title: Pharaoh
blog_text: Lovin Life and Livin Large!  This family took me in and we immediately fell in love.  Sooo happy to be staying with my Foster Family.  As you can see, I have two human and two dog siblings and we are all having a blast together – that’s me in the middle of the pic.

name: Bela
title: Bela
blog_text: I was Bela, now I’m Betty.  I chose a new name to suit my new life with my Fosters whom I decided to Adopt.  I am living my best life with them!  As you can see, I have a wonderful home and just adore my Family.

name: Tobias
title: Tobias
blog_text: GO, TOBIAS, GO!!!   I was rescued from a Shelter from this Fabulous Foster Family and now I am going to my Forever Home with this wonderful family where I will get to live with another Dane mix, a MinPin, a Chihuahua and 2 birds.  Guess who’s gonna be the biggest nugget in that happy meal!  I can’t wait to settle in with them all in one big cuddle pile

name: Maggie
title: Maggie
blog_text: Maggie here, and I’m super excited to tell you my Foster Mama and Dad have adopted me.  They knew I was the one for them when they first saw my picture and saw my story.  I am in an amazing home with a Mama who has been my champion from Day One.

name: Charlee
title: Charlee
blog_text: My Foster Family described me as the Perfect Dane for a family who has never lived with a Dane before.  So here I go!!!  I’m so excited to meet my new family where I will get to live with their black lab and their cat – and I will get to show them all the cool commands I know.

name: Declan
title: Declan
blog_text: You would not believe the life I am living!  I have this great Dad that just adopted me and I get to have visits from a Newfoundland and lots of other dogs – really big fluffy playtoys, wheeee!

name: King
title: King
blog_text: My Foster Dad calls us The King and I – and we are a bonded pair navigating our way thru the kingdom together.  He has given me a home when I was in a shelter without much hope and nursed me through my tail amputation.

name: Simba
title: Simba
blog_text: Can you believe what a whirlwind courtship I have had with this Rescue???  Exactly one month ago I was picked up from a shelter by this amazing Foster Family and today, I met my forever family and am going home with them!!!  I hear not all adoptions are this quick, so I must have done something Very Right!  (Okay, it was probably my Foster Family, but I’m taking the credit for the cuteness factor.)

name: Indie
title: Indie
blog_text: Just look at little cute me in my Mama’s arms!  And that is my Adopted Sister, Coco Chanel,  and I just love hanging out with her and learning from her.  I’m Indie and my Mama is naming me Grace Kelly.  I don’t think she has any real idea how much of a Princess I’m going to be, tee hee.

name: Brady
title: Brady
blog_text: Can you believe it???  A new home, a new family and a new name (Charlie) all at the same time.  I hit the jackpot folks – pulled from a shelter because someone did not want me and dropped into this amazing wonderland of love.  Soooo grateful to my Foster Family for loving me all the way to here!!!

name: Rosie
title: Rosie
blog_text: Wheee, look at Meeee!  Rosieeeee – I’m have a forever home with an amazing family who was just waiting for me to come along.  I have a very special Standard Poodle brother who is so happy to have someone to play with and I will be absolutely adored by all, but I am especially a daddy’s girl.

name: Blue
title: Blue
blog_text: Are you ready for a great success story?  Listen up:  Blue here,  my Foster Family sprang me from a shelter where I was miserable and scared.  Foster Mom says they could tell my spirit and hope were so broken.  Now every day, I get to light up their faces when they see me zooming through the back yard with a toy in my mouth and tail wagging.  They love me and I love them!!!

name: Finnlee
title: Finnlee
blog_text: Can you believe it?  It’s only been 19 days since I came into the Rescue and I have already been adopted!  You see, this Family has been keeping an eye out for me and when I saw them, it was love at first sight!  I have these two cool teenagers to hang with, a young Dane puppy (yippee, I think) and 2 cats.  What a cool place I found.

name: Blew
title: Blew
blog_text: I did it!    I am the smartest Dane on earth – I figured out how to charm my way out of a shelter into a great Foster home and then get a really wonderful family to adopt me!  Okay, the Fosters and Adopters may have had a bit of say, but I still WIN!!!

name: Kingston
title: Kingston
blog_text: The King is in the House!  And the really large Yard!   I scored it big with my new Family.  I get a really big property to play on with my new GSD sister and we are figuring out how to really rip up the pea patch together.

name: Pumpkin
title: Pumpkin
blog_text: I’ve been a lot of things because of my color – red fawn, apricot fawn, warm orange fawn – but my favorite new name is Daphne because that is what my new Forever Dad is calling me! I’m so happy with him and the cats and life is just grand.

name: Watson
title: Watson
blog_text: Watson is in the house!  Permanently!    I just got to my new forever home and am snuggling in good.  My new mom does not have other pets, so I will get all her attention, but we will have plenty of play dates.  Life is good!!!

name: Malikai
title: Malikai
blog_text: When my original mom got sick and could not take care of me, this wonderful family invited me home with them.  I have a little Lab brother to play with and we are having the time of our lives!

name: Athena
title: Athena
blog_text: Do you remember Polly Pocket? My Forever Family is calling me Polly because I’m always trying to get into their pockets. Just look at cute little me with my Newfie Sister and my human Sister and Brothers. This is the best day of my Life!!

name: Apollo
title: Apollo
blog_text: Apollo has landed in a great family and I have a Little Big Brother who has helped me settle in!  Harry the Boxer took a minute to figure out what the Big Lug was lying next to him on the couch, but I think he kinda likes cuddling up to me.  And I got 2 human brothers in the deal!!!

name: Daisy
title: Daisy
blog_text: From Mom’s mouth to your ears!  ” We are so happy to have Daisy in our home and are loving spoiling her!! It feels like she has always been here. She was definitely the missing piece to our puzzle.”  I am with this amazing family forever!!!

name: Dan
title: Dan
blog_text: Dan the Man executed the Plan.  That’s right – my original family had to let me go and they brought me to my wonderful Foster Man and I immediately set out to win her heart.  Mission Accomplished – I’m staying with my Foster Mom and Sister and their little dog too!!!

name: Scooby Doo
title: Scooby Doo
blog_text: Love is in the air!  My foster family fell in love with me and what better day to adopt me than Valentines Day! They are naming me Milo so fewer people think I’m a movie star and want my autograph.  Hehe.

name: Coffee Bean
title: Coffee Bean
blog_text: I am living with the most amazing family!  Since the day I came to their house, they have been working with me and taking me to special and fun training classes so I can be the Greatest Dane I can be. I’m SO happy!

name: Maggie
title: Maggie
blog_text: I am now leading the charmed life I was always meant to have.  I went from a shelter to this amazing family who has fostered many Danes for the Rescue and now I am living with them forever with my older Dane Sister, who was also one of their Fosters.

name: Lily
title: Lily
blog_text: Someone once said “A Lily does not blossom without the rain” and I find that to be most true.  But the true sunshine showed up when a lady found out I was abandoned and called the Rescue and my new family immediately came and scooped me up.  They have loved me black into blossoming and I am forever thankful for them.

name: Tyson
title: Tyson
blog_text: What a charmed life I’m living – just imagine, my family loved me to pieces, but my human kids developed allergies to me, so this amazing family took me in when I needed a Foster Home and they loved all over me.  And when my Forever Family found me, they and their female Dane fell in love with me too.  I never knew there was so much love in this big world!

name: Sailor
title: Sailor
blog_text: This Sailor has found his home port!   A kind lady rescued me from a breeder, stud that I am, and this wonderful family agreed to Foster me and help me through my neuter and recuperation and I have decided to keep them forever.  They call me Bently and I could not have found a better family.  Let’s go play some more (after my nap)!

name: Coco
title: Coco
blog_text: I was voted into the family!   I worked really hard to show my Foster Family that I belong in their home – my Foster Brother Beau even showed me the ropes around the neighborhood.  When the final vote was cast, I walked over to my Foster-now-Forever Mom and gave her a big hug to seal the deal.

name: Mav and Millie
title: Mav and Millie
blog_text: There is no “heard it through the grapevine” for this pair of M&Ms – we are telling our Truth with a capital T!  We are Milley and Maverick and we grew up together and when our owner had to let us go for his health reasons, the most amazing family took us both in.  We wiggled and giggled and danced our way into their hearts and we just love them so much we are going to stay with them forever!

name: Blu
title: Blu
blog_text: My name is Blu, but I am no longer blue because I get to live forever with my new Dane Sister Elsa and my new Mom and Dad!!!   This is the best day of my life!

name: Salem
title: Salem
blog_text: I did it!  I found my forever family and can’t wait!  I’m going to live in a place with a huuuuuuge fenced area with a lady that is going to love on me all day long!

name: Ella
title: Ella
blog_text: YESSS, that’s me, Ella in the blue bathing suit and my brother Simba in the black and white trunks – he is an RMGDRI alum from last year and he quickly taught me all I need to know about this amazing family that adopted me.  And the meals at this resort – just Wowza!

name: Cowboy
title: Cowboy
blog_text: Cowboy has a home! YIPPEE KI-YAY!  Cowboy is in the house to stay.  I have this amazing Foster Dude Dog Ranch where I gave ’em some ballyhoo about wantin to stay in a place where I never get peckish and they just turned out  to be someone to ride the river with.  Yessiree Bob.  I’m hitchin this little hoss to their post fer gud.  Aint I the cutest little saddlebug you’ve ever seen!

name: Duke
title: Duke
blog_text:
Duke crossed the rainbow bridge today.
With the love of his foster family and all the vets that fell in love with him, Duke was able to live 2 months longer than anyone expected.  He rallied for the 3 months he was in their care, but the past few days, he was again having a hard time getting up and walking and the medications were no longer keeping up with his pain levels. With nothing more we could do to keep him comfortable, it was time to say goodbye to this sweet boy.
Thank you so much to his foster family Anne, Adam, Jack, Lucy, Luke & Great Dane Captain who took him in knowing very well that he would only be with them for a short time.  With their care and massive amounts of love, he spent his final days in a loving family that every Dane dreams of.  Rest in peace sweet boy, you will never be forgotten.
Thank you to everyone who donated to his care, and to Lap of Love and Dr. Mary who were able to make his transition peaceful and in the place he loved so much.

name: Stetson
title: Stetson
blog_text: So I had this wonderful Foster Family where I got some really good love and training and enjoyed my two Foster Dane Sisters – and my story got even better.  I just got Adopted into a home with other Dogs, goats, chickens and Alpacas, and the humans are pretty great too.

name: Blue Harl
title: Blue Harl
blog_text: Blue has a home! I have some great news – my Foster Family adopted me and I could not be happier!  I have these really cool kids to live with and my new Family has been working with me on some training too, WooHoo!

name: Ryven
title: Ryven
blog_text: I’m Ryven and am in my new home with my amazing new parents!  I love them already and can’t wait to settle into my new home with them.

name: Maizy
title: Maizy
blog_text: It took me a hot minute, but I’ve found my Forever Home and I’m never leaving.   My family adopted my amazing Dane brother last year and when they heard I was tired of moving around to different homes, they quickly took me in and now I’m in the bestest menagerie on the planet!

name: Apollo 11
title: Apollo 11
blog_text: Apollo has a home! I have the most amazing story to tell.  My owner had to go into a nursing home and so I was taken to a shelter.  RMGDI found me there and I got to stay with an experienced Foster until my Forever Family was found.

name: Millie
title: Millie
blog_text: Silly Millie here – I’ve found my forever home and could not be happier.  My new family learned about me and I came over for a visit and decided to stay!  I get to live with 2 cats and 2 ferrets!!!

name: Vader
title: Vader
blog_text: I’m Home, Mom!    I landed at my Forever Home and it is grand!  I have a human brother and sister to play with and a Dog Sister and a Hamster!  I’m loving my dog bed and the couch and the back yard.  Life is Good!

name: Ada
title: Ada
blog_text: I have the most exciting news!  My Foster Family decided I can stay forever because I wiggled and giggled my way into their hearts.  And get this – whenever someone new comes to the family, I will Always be the Big Sister.

name: Thor
title: Thor
blog_text: Ahhh yes, I am in the mountains and loving life with my forever family.  I have a really cool Husky/Akita sister to hand with and a couple cats – but my Forever Mom is really the Cat’s Meow!

name: Remus
title: Remus
blog_text: Remus has a home! I’m so excited and I just can’t hide it!  I had this amazing Foster Family and they got me ready for my forever home and I just landed there.  I get to live with a Labrador and a cat and go on millions of walks.  Life is great!

name: Apollo
title: Apollo
blog_text: You know, I was looking for a home with humans that get just how special I am, and Lookee Here I found it!  My new family has loved all over me from my first day in the Rescue and I couldn’t be happier.  And I have a big fenced yard to zoom, zoom, zoom.

name: Harlem
title: Harlem
blog_text: My Foster Mom is from NY and she knew right away we were kindred souls since my name is Harlem.  She and my new Dad fell in love with me during our video chat and wanted to adopted me right away.  They have done everything to make me feel welcome and loved because they knew me and my old family would be missing each other.

name: Luna
title: Luna
blog_text: The first message I sent to the Rescue when I got to my new Foster home was please tell them I love my new brudders and mom and dad.  Here I am surrounded by them.  No better place for a senior girl like me to love and be loved!

name: Maggie
title: Maggie
blog_text: I was taken to a shelter on July 4th while everyone else celebrated liberty.  I was scared to even leave the kennel.  On July 8th, the most amazing family freed me and took me home forever.  4 months later and it is Maggie Adoption day!!

name: Maivis
title: Maivis
blog_text: Just look at Cute Little Me!  I am the luckiest girl ever – I found this amazing Foster home with some young kids that I adore and great parents and they decided to keep me forever!

name: Siryn Rey
title: Siryn Rey
blog_text: Just look at me and my new little sister, Poppy!  I am so happy to have been fostered and adopted by this little buddy and her cat, too.  My new Mom works from home and I get lots of attention and this is a great life.

name: Milo
title: Milo
blog_text: I know you won’t believe this, but me and my two brothers were just too much for one house, so my amazing Foster Family said I could live with them forever! I have another dog and two cats to live with and I absolutely adore my whole family.

name: Oreo
title: Oreo
blog_text: This cookie is double trouble and has found his perfect jar.  I am living the sweet life in my forever home and am happily sandwiched between my new Mom and Dad, with a big chocolate dog sister filling.  Thank you, Robert and Stephanie for Fostering and Adopting me!

name: Sheba
title: Sheba
blog_text: I have the best Mom ever.  She pulled me from a shelter when no one else wanted me.  We’ve been through training together and medical challenges together and we are best friends.

name: Niko
title: Niko
blog_text: King of the Kouch, Niko is in the House!   That’s right, I’m keeping my Foster Family forever because we are all so happy together!  Thank you Renan and Ashley for Fostering me and falling head over paws.

name: Ramona
title: Ramona
blog_text: I’m Ramona, now Nova, loving my new life with my forever family!  My original owner passed away and a family took me in that could not care for me, and I ended up here with the perfect ending to my story.

name: Echo & Ronan
title: Echo & Ronan
blog_text: Ahhhh, Yes, it’s the good life for us!  I’m Echo, the black female in the front, and my brother Ronan is the grey male hiding his face in the shadow.   We are loving live in our forever home and we are so very thankful this amazing family agreed to take us both so we could grow old(er) together!

name: Tyr
title: Tyr
blog_text: I have a great story to tell you:  I’m Tyr, and me and my brother Loki went to a shelter because our family couldn’t take care of us anymore.  My forever family scooped me up and worked with me on meeting new people and dogs and after some great training, decided it was time to call me their own.  I’m loving my human sibs and my Dane and Newfie sibs too!

name: Belle
title: Belle
blog_text: Oh, what a beautiful mornin!  From a Shelter in Colorado to my forever home in Oklahoma, this ol’ gal is sittin pretty.  I have a forever mom who loves me to pieces and I get to enjoy the grands visiting too!

name: Dazzle
title: Dazzle
blog_text: My Dazzling personality won out!  My Foster Family adopted my really cool Foster Brother Stetson a few months ago and then found me and now I have my forever family too.  They call me Ripley (believe it or not!).

name: Kumo
title: Kumo
blog_text: Taking a rest after a workout.  Ok, taking a rest after taking a rest in my forever home!  I have this amazing family with my two favorite human sisters and we are Deep Fried Frenz!

name: Clementine
title: Clementine
blog_text:
Gus, to teach her how to Dane.  She is being loved to pieces by her Foster / Adoptive family and is growing into the beautiful Lady she is meant to be.
Thank you, Holly, for Fostering and Adopting Darling Clementine.

name: Scout
title: Scout
blog_text: Scout’s Oath:  On my honor, I will do my best to do my duty to my new family – they took me in and worked with me on barking and learning to meet other dogs and people and I am staying forever with this amazing family!(And I got another dog and a cat in the deal along with these great humans.)

name: Roxxy
title: Roxxy
blog_text: I love my very small world!  My new brother, Snoop (the dark guy in the picture) used to live with my Foster parents!  And now I have been adopted by him and my new forever parents.  Some things are just meant to be.

name: Winston
title: Winston
blog_text: Winston has a home! Oh, this all happened with just a few smacks of these lips! My Best Foster Parents took me in when I was in bad shape, they nursed me and loved me and my Foster Sisters welcomed me right into the family. They documented my journey and helped me build a big fan base and now I’m a Star with my own Winivan and chauffeur! Oh the places we will go. Check out my story on Instagram @lovebigwinston.

name: Huey
title: Huey
blog_text: Huey is in the House for good!  I just landed in my forever home with a big sister to help me get through my puppy years, and two human brothers to take great care of me.  And just in time to meet Santa Paws!

name: Dewey
title: Dewey
blog_text: Just look at cute little me!!  My mom came into the Rescue with me in her belly and our Foster Family decided I could live with them forever!

name: Louie
title: Louie
blog_text: Lucky Louie, now Frankie, here.  My mom and dad were used as breeders, but that didn’t stop me from finding an amazing forever home with a big brother to teach me how to Dane, and all in time for the Howlidays!

name: Loki
title: Loki
blog_text: 299 is my lucky number – that’s the number of days I was in Foster care until my Forever Mom found me and now we are inseparable – which is just fine since I really don’t like to be left alone. Thank you to all the wonderful people who fostered me and believed in me along the way: Julia, Hollie, Tim, Maribeth & Larry.

name: Lady
title: Lady
blog_text: Wheee!  Look at Meee!  Adopteee Lady!  My Foster Mom brought me into her home with my new brother Dane and brother Cat – what a life I’m living!

name: Luna Nova
title: Luna Nova
blog_text: I may not look like a little puppy, but I’m only 8 months old and have found the best forever family.  I have two human kids to live with and my new big brother Dane!  My new parents saw my picture from being rescued from a puppy mill and immediately considered me their own.

name: Ember
title: Ember
blog_text: Plucked from a puppy mill at 5 months old, my Forever Mom saw I needed a home and took me in.  Her other Dane, Porter, is showing me how to Dane and I am quite settled in.  And my name Ember is the same as Mom’s last Dane, Aschen, which is German for Ember.  It was just meant to be.

name: Zelda
title: Zelda
blog_text: Just look at me now!  I came into the Rescue as a timid girl who needed some basic manners and training and now I’m living my best life with my new family.  Who knew it could be this good?

name: Skoll
title: Skoll
blog_text: I am living my best new life!  I came into a shelter underweight and with a broken tail.  They fixed me up and my Foster Mama made the trip to set me free.  We are loving all over each other and she is my hero.

name: Bruno
title: Bruno
blog_text: Bruno has a home!  WIP – yep, that’s me, a Work In Progress.  I have this great Foster family that has worked so hard with me and we decided the family that trains together stays together!

name: Duke
title: Duke
blog_text: This cute little cuddlebug (my parents words) is having the time of my life.  My fosters brought me home and helped me settle in and I have two kids to play with too!

name: Erza
title: Erza
blog_text: Happy New Year to you, Happy New Life to me!  I am the first Dane to be placed in 2025 and I am I am in a wonderful new home where I will get to meet my new mom’s clients and be around her all day long.

name: Bella
title: Bella
blog_text: I fit right into my new forever family as soon as I arrived as a foster – they said I have been the perfect pup and they love my playfulness and how good I am with kids and guests.

name: Korben
title: Korben
blog_text: Living the Dream with my new mom!  She took one look at me on the Rescue website and decided we two belong together forever.

name: Donut
title: Donut
blog_text: Once upon a time, in a land far away, there was a camel named Humperdink and he asked for a Great Dane for his birthday and he got one.  He liked Blue the Harlequin so much he asked for another one and the camel fairy brought me!  Blue and I are now Buds, but Hump is my special friend.

name: Tiny Tim
title: Tiny Tim
blog_text: From Shelter Life where I was named Tiny Tim to a Sheltered Life – my stars must have lined up!  My Forever Mom named me Mowgli because I adapted so well to my new life, with her.

name: Maximus
title: Maximus
blog_text: Yep – it didn’t take me long to choose my forever home.  My Foster Mom knew I needed a calm place and I knew she needed a big snuggle bunny like me. We are thick as thieves and happy as clams.

name: Lilah
title: Lilah
blog_text: I am with my forever family and I took one whole second for me to make friends with my new Dane brother!  This is heaven.

name: Hennessey
title: Hennessey
blog_text: Smooth like Hennessey Whiskey.  That was my acceptance into my new forever home.  My 3-time (now 4-time!)  RMGDRI Adopters knew right away I am their girl and we are all enjoying quiet moments and lots of love.

name: Bruno
title: Bruno
blog_text: My new name is Truman and I found this amazing Foster home and decided this family was worth keeping, so I adopted them!  And I got a Great Pyr sister, a Pyr/Husky/Akita brother and a human brother in the bargain.  Life is Good!

name: Onyx
title: Onyx
blog_text: Can you see me now?   I’m in my Forever Home and want everyone to know!  My parents heard I was in a shelter an rushed to get me out.  My new Dane big brother said I could stay and I’m living my best life ever!

name: Sven
title: Sven
blog_text: Sunbathing, howlin with the sirens, fun walks with my people – I’m loving life in my new forever home!

name: Velma
title: Velma
blog_text: My new name is Maggie and I am so happy to be in my Forever home. I have these two amazing brothers to play with as we all grow up together and we all have the best Mom in the world!

name: Scooby
title: Scooby
blog_text: Scooby now Louie has a home! I made it home to my Forever Family!  They drove for hours in the snow to get me and we drove even more hours home in the weather (and I got lots of snuggling).  And I got a new big sister Bouvier!

name: Echo
title: Echo
blog_text: I found my forever home and settled in fast! I have another dog to hang out with and kiddos to play with and parents who loved me immediately. Life is Good, Good, Good, Goooooood!

name: Harley
title: Harley
blog_text: I am in my forever home and life is sooooo goooood!  My Fosters picked me up from the shelter and brought me into their home where I have another dog and a cat to pal around with, and lots of love!

name: Bee
title: Bee
blog_text: I could not Bee in a better place!  When my Foster Dad learned I needed a home, he buzzed on over and grabbed me and we’ve been inseparable ever since.

name: Bolt
title: Bolt
blog_text: It’s Real!  I used my superpowers to travel across two states, I landed at my Forever home and after thorough investigation of the house I zeroed in on the toy box.  No hamsters here, but there are two cats.  I told you it’s real!

name: Groot
title: Groot
blog_text: I am Groot!  Well not anymore, now I am Glenn a much more distinguished name for a guy like me. I finished my long journey home.   From a Shelter several states away to my amazing foster home and now with my forever family that I just adore.  I have learned some people are pretty OK in my book.

name: Lady
title: Lady
blog_text: I once heard if you hang around someone’s house long enough and eat their food, they will just adopt you.  I tried it and it worked!  I fell in love with my Fosters and am staying forever!

name: Phantom
title: Phantom
blog_text: It was a whirlwind courtship and now I am in my forever home!  My new name is Carl and I’m living my best life with my new dog buddy Jack and a couple cats and parents who just adore me!

name: Josie
title: Josie
blog_text: I am really leading a Charmed Life.  My First Forever Parents had medical conditions and so my Last Forever Family quickly invited me in and I am loving living with another dog again and my new family.

name: Jack
title: Jack
blog_text: Jack has a home! Look at Little Cute Me Now!  I was abandoned and picked up by a shelter, a family brought me home to save me and contacted the Rescue to find my forever home.  My Foster Dad and Foster Brother grabbed me and we held on tight to each other and we Three Amigos are ready for the world.

name: Merle
title: Merle
blog_text: I found my forever home and we have become fast friends already – and we both enjoy snuggles and cuddles, so Win Win!

name: Blue
title: Blue
blog_text: Just look at me now!  I bounced around a bit but when I came into the Rescue I landed in the Sweet Spot of Foster Danes.  I did my best to  impress the two girls I’m living with and they agreed to share their two Basset Hounds with me, so I decided to stay forever

name: Tux
title: Tux
blog_text: The best dressed guy in the Rescue has found my forever home on a farm with a young lab to pal around with. And mynew mom says house cows are not as messy as the ones in the pasture. I will Not be exchanging my tuxedo for overalls.

name: Sammi
title: Sammi
blog_text:
Sammi has a home!  She is staying with her Fosters!!
I’m the luckiest girl alive!  I am living with three other dogs and a whole herd of horses and my new family is giving me all the love and time I need to settle in with them forever.  Amazing families like this make the world go round.

name: Bailey
title: Bailey
blog_text: I just spent time with a wonderful foster family who pulled me from a shelter and got me ready for my forever family – they filled out an application just for ME!  And now we are together forever.

name: Moose
title: Moose
blog_text: Moose-ic to my ears!  My new brother, Teddy, talked to mom and they agreed I’m a keeper and I get to part of their herd forever!  C’mon, Teddy, let’s go play!

name: Odie
title: Odie
blog_text: Odie is in the house. I just landed at my forever home and am looking forward to giving my new Dad all the love he can stand and then some more!

name: Zena
title: Zena
blog_text: It was love at first sight!  My new family claimed me as soon as they were approved and now I have 2 Springer Spaniels to pal around with and 2 big brothers to charm and snuggle with.

name: Phoenix
title: Phoenix
blog_text: My Final Foster Family, who adopted Niko in 2023, invited me to join their Forever Family and I said YESSSS! And now we are One Big Happy Family!

name: Leo
title: Leo
blog_text: I used to be Leo and now I am Theo because my forever Mom and Dad said I am really just a big teddy bear and as such a perfect Theodore.   We are all doing great together and we love each other so much!

name: Bear
title: Bear
blog_text: Bear has a great home and a new brother and sister to call his own.

name: Arlo
title: Arlo
blog_text: I did it! I made it to my Forever Family in record time after my Fosters pulled me from a shelter and helped me get ready.  Life is good!

name: Bruce
title: Bruce
blog_text: This is Kai, my Best Brother, holding me up after a day of play.  He is a RMGDI Alum and I’m proud to join his special group with by Best Family who is giving us both our Best Lives.  No better Holiday gift than this.

name: Bunker
title: Bunker
blog_text: Wow, just Wow!  My Foster Mom flew to my home state to pick me up and drive me home and she and Foster Dad got me ready for my forever home – I went to this lovely family to stay while my Foster parents were traveling and BAM!  They adopted me.  Great Dane People are just amazing.

name: Forest
title: Forest
blog_text: My Fosters just could not bear to part with me so I’m staying with them forever they are helping me learn to Dane!

name: Misty
title: Misty
blog_text: What a wild ride I’ve had, from a troubled background to a shelter to an awesome Foster Family and now to my Forever Home.   Wheeee I just slid in to home plate.
